name: Morph Proxy
description: A proxy for the Morph.io API

OWNER.description: The owner of the Morph.io scraper, blank to allow any

SCRAPER.description: The name of the Morph.io scraper, blank to allow any

FORMAT.description: The format in which to return data, csv, json or atom. Leave blank for any

QUERY.description: To limit to just this query

CALLBACK.description: The JSONP callback to run, if required

CANNED_ONLY.description: Set to true to limit to canned queries only, no free-form SQL
